description:
Chen Guo has been secretly in love with Xiao Qi for eight years and thought he would never have the chance to see him again, but he suddenly got married to him.

Knowing that he (XQ) married him (CG) in order to get revenge on his (CG) parents, Chen Guo still cherishes the opportunity to be with him. Not only taking care of his life meticulously, but also satisfying him physically, in the hope that one day, he (XQ) will also love himself.>
